name: FBLA 365 V2 (Kyle & Anuj)
description:
A game created for the FBLA Game and Simulation Programming competitive event for the 2017-2018 competition year. Play as Kevin, a FBLA student at FB-Lake High School over the course of three days. Do good deeds for people all over campus to gain enough favor to be elected chapter president by the end of the game. 

Check out kalechipps's (co-collaborator) itch.io here: http://kalechipps.itch.io/
